responses:
I've worked on several exciting projects! My main ones include:

**AI Trading System** - An autonomous multi-agent trading platform with 4 AI traders using different investment strategies (value, macro, systematic, crypto). They manage $10K portfolios and execute 100+ trades daily with full audit trails.

**Intelligent FAQ Assistant with RAG** - A production RAG system that handles 5,000+ queries daily with 92% accuracy. It reduced customer support costs by $250K annually and achieved 4.7/5 user satisfaction.

**House Price Prediction System** - An ML pipeline achieving 92% prediction accuracy with $15K average error on $300K+ properties, processing valuations in under 2 seconds.

Would you like details on any specific project?

I specialize in building production-ready AI and ML systems. My standout projects include:

â€¢ **AI Trading System** - Multi-agent platform with autonomous traders
â€¢ **RAG FAQ Assistant** - Enterprise-grade knowledge system handling 5K+ daily queries
â€¢ **House Price Prediction** - ML model with 92% accuracy for real estate valuation

Each project demonstrates end-to-end development from data to deployment. Which project interests you most?

I've built several production AI systems:

**AI Trading System**: Autonomous multi-agent trading with 4 AI traders managing portfolios
**RAG FAQ Assistant**: Enterprise support system with 92% accuracy, handling 5K+ queries/day
**House Price Prediction**: ML model with 92% accuracy for property valuation

All projects are production-ready with full MLOps pipelines. Want to know more about any of them?

**Frontend**: React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Streamlit, Gradio

**Databases**: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, SQLite, Pinecone, FAISS, ChromaDB

**Cloud & MLOps**: AWS, GCP, Azure, Vercel, Docker, MLflow, Git, CI/CD

**Backend**: FastAPI, REST APIs, Model Deployment & Monitoring

I build scalable AI systems covering the full lifecycle from data to deployment!
